content.detailedDescription: I was driving back to the university of missouri at around 11:30pm(23:30) after getting late meal with a friend and as i was driving back i noticed what i initially thought was a bright star in the west/northwest part of the sky at about a 40 degree elevation. as i was looking at it from my truck i noticed that it was not stationary like a star so i pulled over and watched it for as long as i could. as i watched the brownish/orangish orb in the sky it appeared to be moving in an erratic manor, similar to how a laser pointer moves when you are trying to hold it steady on a wall, and did not have any sort of warning or strobe lights like you would expect aircraft to have. after several minutes it began to fade and then got much brighter, then i had to move because there were other cars that needed to get by and i lost it behind a tree for 3 seconds max and after that it was no where to be found. i live a block from two hospitals that receive a lot of emergency transfers via helicopter so i am as familiar with them as i could be without any real expertise and i couldn't imagine an airplane moving in that fashion. the closest thing i can compare it to would be an emergency flare but it didn't move the way you would expect a flare to move and i could not imagine anybody would be firing flares in columbia missouri.
content.summary: Orb, pulsated, west northwest section of the sky, moved like a laser pointer being held on a distant object

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:15pm on sunday april 28th. a friend and i were sitting outside huddled around a bonfire. i'd say about 10 other people were around us. we happened to be looking up at the sky already because someone made a comment about how there were searchlights coming from downtown being cast into the sky. then suddenly out of the north, a strange shape appeared and flew directly above us. it traveled at a fairly slow speed... a lot slower than any airplane would. it made no sound... just drifted slowly above us. it was a triangular-shaped dark mass, with three large pink/orange spheres of light. the lights were not blinking, but constant. they were not overly bright, but just sort of glowing. it flew in front the moon... and the strangest part was that the object was translucent. i could see the light of the moon through it. it traveled in a straight line from north to south. the sighting only lasted about 15 seconds before the object disappeared over the roofs around us. we were all a bit stunned... and sort of freaked out after! everyone around us started chattering and talking. we were all trying to piece together what we'd just seen. it wasn't like anything i'd ever seen before, that's for sure.
content.summary: Triangular shaped dark gray/semi translucent craft with three large pink/orange sphere-like lights

content.detailedDescription:
i am a avid amatuer star gazzer and had a family event at my elk grove residence on saturday april 28,2012. i was in my back yard with 6 adults and i got a light  out of the corner of my left eye and my first thought was that it was the space shuttle flying over.(i keep track of the fly overs, but as soon as i saw it i realized that the shuttle was no longer flying.

  i turned to my left which would have been facing directly north and said out loud "what the hell is that" and pointed to the object moving northwest to southeast at a pretty straight line. it was was about 30-40 degress above the horizon and had no blinking lights and was a blue-white color. as it moved from my left to my right i noticed that there was another of the same shapes trailing behind the first one. everyone in my back yard noticed it as well and we all started watching these lights. as we watched more started to appear traveling in the same genera direction. they where not moving fast like a shooting star or a metorite but at a fairly fast and very steady speed. they where moving at different altitudes and i ran inside to get my binoculars and came back outside to see 3-4 more coming from the northwest.

    when i focused in on on of them it was a bluish-white color and it definitely had no blinking navigation lights and there was no trail or tail behind any of them. there was no sound coming from them. as we watched i kept my eyes on the first 5-6 and they suddenly turned and started moving straight south and then started moving more of a 75-90 degree angle into the sky. then those first 5-6 moved into a triangle-like position in the southeast sky with a smaller red lighted craft moving towards the center and then they just disappeared.

    the other members of my family kept there eyes on another group that turned directly north and disappered below the treeline in the distance. this group also a red lighted craft that appeared to be following it. 

    two of my family members had there smart phones and where taking video with audio, but i have not been able to view those as of yet.

    this was not a short 10-30 second event like a shooting star or a metorite going across the sky. this event lasted 7-10 minutes and had a least 7-10 objects that where viewed by all of us.
  
    my intial reaction was excitment, this is they kind of thing that is a hobby for me and always has been. now that a couple of days have past my wife and i just want to know what we saw. we all know that these where not aiplanes.Ballons,shooting stars or metorites. these objects where not moving any type of random pattern. we all agreed that these craft were defintely flying in a controlled and calculated manner as if on a mission.
content.summary: 6-10  orb to circular objects traveling nw-se with differing spacing  with sudden directtion change and then sudden disapperance.

content.detailedDescription:
As called in to asd by phone: witness wishes to remain anonymous due to her job and would not provide a phone number or e-mail. 

i was getting into my car after work at 9:10 pm on saturday night when i noticed something blinking in the sky. it was very odd - a triagular shaped flying object that had two blinking lights in the rear only. these very very bright white lights were circular and blinked on and off every two seconds (i timed it).  wthere were no other lights on the craft like you would see on a plane.  i called my co-worker outside to look at this and we watched it together - the total time i watched it was five minutes and he saw it for about half that time.  we were both perplexed because it was moving so very slowly and we decided that it could not have been a conventional aircraft.  it did not look like a helicopter, either.  it was triagluar with one end (the front) being longer than the other two sides and the edges were quite thick.  the object was moving in a northeast to southwest direction in a straight line and did not waver from its path.  it did not change altitude, either. i estimate that it was 500 - 1,000 feet from the ground since we could see it fairly well.  we could not see the top very well but it appeared to be flat on all sides. we did not see the front of it. i called to see if anyone else saw this because it is the strangest thing i've ever seen.  we were amazed at how this big solid object was even airborne and how it was moving so slowly!  

a former skeptic.
content.summary: Triangular craft with two slow blinking lights in the back moved very slowly over independence

content.detailedDescription: Here's an update to the report i filed over the weekend and a photo and corrected facebook link.
content.summary: Corrected facebook link and photo of report i filed over the weekend.

content.detailedDescription: We were outside and i noticed a flash. i looked up seen two orbs then some fireball type i got video to prove it  i dont want to right about it..
content.summary: Just saw row of lights turn on about six lights go from left to right

content.detailedDescription:
First photo in black and white has diferent shadow like second one in colour.
object traveled a great distance in one minute and it was huge,regarding the distance.Anyway it look like it is nearest to moon.Trajectory changed only
once for about 30 degrees.
content.summary: Sferic globe,nearest to moon than earth,made a very big distance in one minute.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in my backyard drinking coffee, away from city lights, in the country, shortly before dawn.
approximately 4:30 am observed what i believed to be a fast-moving satellite almost directly overhead. quite high altitude, higher than any plane i have ever seen. no blinking, no noise and moving from the nw to the se.
quite surprised about 30 sec later when two more, seperated somewhat but moving inline - in the same direction but offset somewhat from the path of the first.
perhaps 1 min later, as i was contemplating how unusual this was, when another followed the first three (pursuit?).
some wispy clouds, not many and not thick, but they appeared to travel from horizon to horizon. i lost sight of them behind wispy clouds.
to my best knowledge there is only 1 satellite that travels a north to south path. it comes in the evening, well before midnight (7-8 pm???)
it's path is a more definite north to south direction, these travelled towards a direction about 15 degrees east of south.
most satellites are geo-stationary (move with the earth, appear to be standing still).
much too high for me to say more about their description but they had no blinking or colored lights, no noise and no jetstream. they did not change brightness (all about equal), travel extremely fast nor burn up.
appeared to be above the atmosphere.
never seen anythng like this. hmmm???
content.summary: Like satellites moving in straight line formation, 1 / 2 / 1

content.detailedDescription: Sou uf���logo muito desempenhado no que fa���o. todos um dia v���o dar valor ao nosso trabalho
content.summary: Foi incrível, muito chocante, emocionante, não tenho palavra para explicar.

content.detailedDescription: I was out at 5:49 filming a jet fly over at a high altitude, filmed it for 31 seconds, i was looking at the playback the next day in slow motion when i saw these two orb, or sphere like objects shoot past plane at incredible speed. they were traveling so fast it is no wonder i did not see them fly by through the view finder. i down loaded and put each still frame of event in single movie and will submit it here. first part is uncut film of objects, and i have 50 still images in sequence of the event itself.
content.summary: Filming plane flying over and noticed objects in playback

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard taking pictures of the moon and venus and jupiter.  did not observe the phenomena until picture was uploaded to my laptop.  the picture of the object appeared in only one of my photographs.  all of the photographs were taken with in a few minutes of each other.  does not appear to be moving. i guess it could have been a digital glitch, but have never had this happen.  i was trying out a new camera with a very strong telephoto lens.
content.summary: Did not observe until photo was uploaded to computer.

content.detailedDescription: I was about 4 to 6 years old sometime between 1975 ,and 1977. did'nt know what a ufo was at the time ,so i never thought to tell anyone . i remember like yesterday ! six round bright white light like objects flying in formation three on each side one leading ,last following . they traveled in a straight line north ,or north by northeast . it was a clear summer day . i was playing in the backyard of my home.
content.summary: Six bright white objects like lights in formation one leading last following two groups of three side by side. sunny day not a cloud in the sky !

content.detailedDescription: Driving to a friend's house with my boyfriend, we noticed a large fireball-like object in the sky which first looked to be falling quickly toward the earth. it was quite close, and we live near an airport but it was nothing like the airplanes that we see daily and it was not moving on a steady path. it was very bright and i noticed the edge of the object was moving, or flaming, which is why i first suspected it to be a fireball. instead of falling, the object continued on a very sporadic path, changing direction quickly, moving in circles, while moving farther away. nearby, there was another large, orange and bright object with less movement but it was also moving in quick circular patterns. i began to panic, not knowing what this was (i've always been a skeptic of paranormal/ufos), pulled my car to the side of the road and got out. as i tried to record the lights on my phone, they faded into the sky hovering in one place,  becoming smaller and disappearing (not fading away in a streak of motion). after researching these ufos online, i can't find any other reports of this sighting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange large objects in sky moving fast

content.detailedDescription: I am frightened as this is not the only time i have seen this object, i have seen it several times over the last2-3 years. it appears to be a large round silver bright object that descends from the sky, as if peeking through clouds. about 7:30 pm, on april 29, 2012. i was about to go to sleep, i live on the fifth floor of a walk up and the view is clear of the evening sky. i noticed, as always about this time, military jets making fly overs from on all directions. there it was a large white ball descending from the clouds, it was bright as a star, it stood there a few seconds and ascended. in a few minutes military jets (and now what appears to be civilian) planes sweeping the very spot where this object appeared.I was looking from my apartment window and have a clear view of the sky.I was scared as i knew i had seen this ball of light several times in the last several  years. the object descending, and i saw it as clear as day as the sun had not completely set yet. it is for sure something that, what i felt is not from here. and then i see the military jets fly to the exact location where this object showed it self. it has a pattern, it round, its a ball of light, it descends, and for a few seconds, it ascends. it just then disappeared.
content.summary: Round ball of white light descends and ascends back into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived home at 10 pm. as i got out of my car i heard a flight of canadian geese flying northward. when i looked up, i saw 3 bright lights about 1000 feet above tongass narrows. there was a white light on top, a white light below, and a red light in the center. the lights were slowly flying along with the flock of geese. when i first saw the lights, i thought it was very out of the ordinary since small planes do not fly in our area after dark.

i posted my sighting on my facebook page. the sighting was also reported by several facebook users. one person was able to take a photo with his iphone and posted it on facebook. i lost sight of the object when it and the geese passed in back of a hill.
the fb photo shows white geese flying in formation and the bright lights of the ufo.

my facebook page and description and photo is at: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Object with 3 lights slowly flying northward with a flock of geese over ketchikan, ak

content.detailedDescription:
My children and i were in the hot tub in our back yard which is right at the base of a mountain when my son noticed a bright glowing ball of light in the sky fling south under a trail of smoke from an airplane that was just passing over the monutain traveling west. the object made no noise and traveled at not a very high rate of speed there were no blicking lights and no smoke from the object. we got a little scared so we called for my boyfriend to come see when he got out side it was still in the sky traveling south, he aslo watched the object for a few minutes then he went inside to get the camera and before he even got back outside it just disappered.  

the object would be very hard to describe because it was so bright just like a glowing ball it's movment was so smooth and moved in a straight line but then just vanished it was there and then just gone.  it was a very uneasy feeling it scared my daughter and left me feeling worried i have never had anything like that happen to me before and could have lived with out it.
content.summary: I witnessed a very bright ball of light fling in the sky with no noise.

content.detailedDescription: I was just driving home when i noticed a gigantic pulsating star in the sky. very bright and radiating beams. it was right there in the south sky. i thought it was very "jesus" like as dumb as that sounds. very bright with beams all around it.. it looked like a mini sun in the night sky. i believe it was flying south. soon it was no longer visible. could have been a helicopter, but w/ light beaming all around the entire structure, not likely. i went home parked in the garage as i didn't have my phone. ran in, ran out it was gone. garage door was open when came home.. parked.. closed the garage door. ran in grabbed phone ran out.. garage open again. but it was probably because my dad's car was parked over the sensor. which is strange on its own as he never does that. strange night overall .
content.summary: A huge star in the sky. the size of a full-moon. jesus-like

content.detailedDescription: At the local park recording alien probe.  single object engulfed in light and is within the troposphere of earth's atmosphere.  an airplane is observed conducting a flyby of the probe within the video.  please examine carefully.
content.summary: Fort washington park - alien probe observed

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting took place at 11:15 pm, this evening (march 24, 2012) in front of my apartment in norman, ok.

the object we saw was traveling from south to north. when we first noticed it, it was directly overhead and appeared to be about the size of a dime held at arm's length.

it was shaped like a donut, and had yellow-orange lights all over it, which were flashing in an odd pattern.

in fact, the object seemed to be expanding and contracting slightly. it was plainly visible in spite of the "light pollution" in the area, and we could detect no sound.

when it was at its closest, we got a good enough look to be sure that it was not an ordinary airplane or astronomical object.

it seemed to gain altitude as it moved north, and i watched it until it was no longer visible. it was heading in the general direction of oklahoma city.

actually, we could not see the body to which the lights were attached. i say "donut" because there was a dark spot in the middle. i could not judge size or altitude, so i can't make a guess as to speed.

my first thought was that it might be something attached to a blimp or advertising plane, but a) it was pretty late at night for that, and b) it was moving much too fast for a blimp.
content.summary: It was shaped like a donut, and had yellow-orange lights all over it, which were flashing in an odd pattern.

content.detailedDescription: Videos of alien probes in the washington d.C. metropolitan area.  please pay close attention to the video described as "fort washington view of alien probe.Wmv" at :39 seconds. you will not be disappointed.  believe me, it is mind-blowing.
content.summary: Fort washing ufo (alien probes)

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from rained out races in knoxville going north on hwy 14 wen we saw red lights all same size and distance apart kind of in an arch pattern almost like floating up from a corn field almost like if u shot a roman candle but much bigger.They were in almost vertical line one after other just little redish solid lights they went up and i was seeing them out the windshield stopped to look out back window of truck and they were gone.Never seen anything like it man made..If anyone else saw it plz respond.It was by the prison south of newton.
content.summary: Strange red lights in formation

content.detailedDescription:
(1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?) stargazing
(2. what made you first notice the object?) speed of movement, odd shape
(3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?) aircraft, but all other aircraft in sky were blinking. similar to a satellite. but much larger and brighter.
(4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.) first sighted about 30 degrees above horizon in south. moved quickly across sky toward us, approx north. only white rectangular light visible. appeared much too big (size at closest point was that of a 3/8 inch object at about arm's length) and moved too quickly to be very high up but there was no sound.  changed direction twice, second time to resume original course. report titled: "bright orange light, slow moving, hovered, wobbled, shrank then vanished, reappeared closer coming twd us, changed direction, vanished" on same date in ca, us is very similar. photo imag3540.Jpg is just about what we saw minus the second light to the lower right.
(5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.) calm observation, surprise
(6. how did you lose sight of the object?) quickly vanished, not like it was too far away (it was still rather large at the time) about 30 degrees above horizon.
content.summary: Large bright rectangle light moving fast

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside on my patio, i was quietly enjoying my morning while sipping on a coffee at 10:50 am. i looked up at the sky as i always do, and by chance, spotted bright flying objects. in utter disbelief at the peculiar site in the sky i thought to myself that there was no way they could be birds. i then ran into the house and got my camera and was able to take four pictures before they disappeared just as quickly as they appeared. at 50 years of age i have never seen anything like this in my life and had this feeling that this could very well be ufo's as they came in and out of the atmosphere in such a short course of time. what is even more perplexing is the fact that i was witness to this potential sighting during daytime. another thing to note is when i cropped these objects they look like winged crafts. i am hoping one day i will see more, i am always looking to the sky. i know they are not birds as birds do not fly that high and just disapear. they look like they have head lights on them. what is this mystery? you be the judge.
content.summary: Appeared from nowere then flew around in the sky then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up, it was a normal day, when i was leaving home, i saw this strange trail on the sky. i don't know what it is.
when i leave home, i always look the sky to know if it will rain or not during the day.
it wasn't moving, neither changing colors, it was static.
after some time, it suddenly disappeared.
i haven't seen anything "known" in the sky (airplanes, helicopters, etc) and neither heard sounds.
my friend said me that he had seen a little flying object, moving very quickly and suddenly disappeared leaving that trail. i can't confirm it because i hadn't seen it.
attached are the photos that i took with my mobile.

sorry about my english, i don't speak english, only portuguese. i only know a little about english.
content.summary: A strange thing on the sky

content.detailedDescription: I saw the object for about 3 seconds drifting by overhead from my back yard in the 11203 zip code, went in to get my camcorder and it was gone. it could be just a balloon but i wanted to report it just in case.
content.summary: Could just be a silver balloon

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Arrived home at 10:20 pm pst, walking from car to house, whole family looked up and saw slow moving very bright orange light, bigger and brighter than any visible star or planet.  at first suspected it was a satellite, but it was too low and it's speed was not  consistent.  seemed to hover, move along, hover.  it was low enough to be heard if it was an airplane or helicopter, yet there was no sound coming from it. followed it visually for a couple of minutes, went in the house, came back out about 3 minutes later, object was still in the same area last seen minutes before. kept watching it as we walked across the street to the park. moved slowly across the sky, hovered, seemed to shrink quickly then vanish. less than a minute later another, or maybe the same, orange light reappeared much closer and lower on the horizon, coming toward us, stopped, hovered, wobbled, changed direction, shrank and vanished. waited severeal minutes, nothing appeared. again, there was no sound.
content.summary: Bright orange light, slow moving, hovered, wobbled, shrank then vanished, reappeared closer coming twd us, changed direction, vanished

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family where out said the house in the drive way just enjoin the night wen my son tel me dad what that  light on the sky so all of us turn around and look @ the sky and we saw the 4 strainge object and than a 5 one with the same pattern and description all saw some neighbor watch them to.
content.summary: There were 5 object in line forrmation coming from south east  turnin west incircular chape  bright red and yelow

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my recliner watching tv and facing a bay window with a view to the west. i first noticed the object as a bright light to the wnw and very low on the horizon. i am located at the foot of the peak of the chocolate mountains, so i was looking in the direction of pine mountain? it would be south of palm springs at least 15 or more miles where the object came into view of the mountains. it was clear over the imperial valley, but there were clouds over the pacific ocean and maybe the coast.

when i first saw the object, i thought aircraft out of lax, but immediately realized it was too late in the evening to see reflected light from a plane, so assumed it was the iss, which we looked for once in a while, but had never seen. so i called my wife as i watched the object move up into the night sky, thinking it was the iss, which i knew would be high enough to reflect sunlight through the clouds (redish). she went to the front door next to where my chair is located and went out side. i asked if she could see it and she said she did. i lost sight of the object as it passed above my sun shutters above that window, so i also went to the door to see it. as i aproached the door i noted my wife was standing almost in the door on the porch, but under the overhanging area above the porch. she was watching the object now moving towards the wsw towards the horizon. it had changed direction (she did not see it change, nor did i)between the time she got to the door and the time it had moved above the sun shutters.

except for the time when it was above the roof of my room, i had a direct view of the object for about 3-4 minutes at the most. it was quiet outside that night (i'm in the desert) and there was no noise from the object.

i inquired of several other residents of the resort to see if anyone else had observed the light. one person unknown to me mentioned a light moving to the west to a friend of mine who was in going into the hot tubs. this man was already in the hot tubs and from that position would have an unobstructed view of about 180 degrees. his description of the object to my friend was a bright orange/red light moving to the west very fast, but without the usual tail made by a meteor.

the object:  size: venus was in the western sky at about two slats up on the sun shade (i could see it through the slats) and the object was at least four to five times the diameter of venus.

i can send pictures of the inside looking out, the tubs, etc. if you want. these would just be to set the descriptions, not views of the object. i should have had my wife bring the camera, but the object was not there that long.
content.summary: Not airrplane, not iss, not obvious what it was, but did a 90 degree turn

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my living room watching television when i glanced out the window and saw approximately 7-9 very bright, very distinct reddish orange lights in a, roughly, round formation.  i looked twice to make sure that it wasn't a reflection from lights inside the house.  from the brief look i got through the window it appeared to be hovering, but i cannot be sure of this as i only looked for a few seconds.  though if it was moving, it was, at this point, moving very slowly.  from the look i got through the window, i'd approximate that it was less than a few hundred feet away and relatively low in the sky (if i had to guess i'd say maybe 1,000-3,000 feet).  i got up from my chair and went to the backdoor of the house just a few feet away.  by the time i had opened the door it was just a single, extremely bright point of reddish pink light speeding due east and possibly gaining in altitude (though not much).  it was just after 8pm and the sky was almost completely dark.  there was one star visible just to the right of the object that was considerably dimmer.  this did not look like a planet or star, it was far brighter.  at no point did the object(s) make a sound.  i never saw any of the typical white, red or green strobe lights you normally see on standard aircraft.  the lights never pulsated at all, they were constant.  i also never actually saw the shape/outline of a craft, only lights.  the total sighting lasted about 30-40 seconds.  it was really strange, and unlike anything i've ever seen before.
content.summary: Approximately 9-10 lights hovered briefly then flew off, very quickly, due east.
